title: How to Play
description: You'll see a news card and need to decide if it's real or fake..
If it's fake, you'll have to figure out which trick the villains are using! Hover over the card for more details on the tactic.
If you think the news card is telling the truth, use the “Facts” card.

imageAlt: Example of how many tactics are used
description: The little eye symbols at the bottom right of each news card shows how many tricks are being used.

If you make the wrong guesses, you will lose followers, but if you guess correctly, you will gain more.

The player with the most followers at the end wins!
